Name: Cruel Arena
About the game: Cruel Arena is a classic arena survival zombie game. Face endless hordes and survive as much as you can, Through The Doodles and The Frames!! Will you do the best record among your friends? A few tips: -Press S to buy something. -Always, Always, Always keep yourself in movement! Learn how to move and they will never catch you! -WASD to move, left mouse to shoot, and right one to throw a granade! -P to PAUSE. -That's all, get ready!
